package.name: BTRenamer
package.shortDescription: Rename Bluetooth devices from within the Settings pane

descriptionlist.description: Tap on a Bluetooth device name to change it
Requires a reboot (which means that Electra will need to be re-run after). I would suggest not rebooting until you change all of the names you want
Credit to @Alexandre for most of the code, I just updated it for iOS 11.
